participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Caring and optimistic, loves to support others.
participant_1.background: I am not close with my parents. I spend a lot of time driving my kids to sports events. I love watching romantic comedies and listening to the Red Hot Chili Peppers. I enjoy the flexibility of my work schedule so I can spend time with my family and dog. I work 2 jobs.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, values personal growth.
participant_2.background: I have never been to a fortune teller, as I believe that my future is in my own hands. My mother is in the hospital. My dog's name is Wonwon. I am not sure of my ethnic background because I was adopted. I really like watching Star Trek.

content.text: I'm doing well! What about you?
I'm doing okay. My mother is in the hospital so I'm a bit worried.
Oh no, I'm so sorry to hear that. I hope she gets better soon.
Thank you. I'm trying to stay positive.
I think that's a great attitude. I'm sure she'll be home before you know it.
I'm glad we're talking. What are some of your hobbies?
I like watching Star Trek, and listening to the Red Hot Chili Peppers.
Oh cool! I've never been to a Star Trek convention, but I've heard they're a lot of fun.
Me neither. I've been wanting to go to one, but I've never had the time.
I'm sure you'd have a great time. What do you like about Star Trek?
I like the idea of exploring the universe and meeting new people.
Me too. I think it's so amazing to think about all the possibilities out there.
I know right? It's so exciting!
I'm glad we're on the same page.
